ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Age in years
Visit name
Notes: e.g., Baseline, 6-Month Follow Up, Year 2, Daily

ElementDescription: Version/code of assessment
Notes: e.g., Self-Report, Parent Form, Short Form, Revised Version

ElementDescription: Leisure activities: sitting, past 7 days
Notes: 0=Never; 1=Seldom (1-2 days); 2=Sometimes (3-4 days); 3=Often (5-7 days); Blank = Missing form/incomplete workbook/Not expected/Missing/Refused/Do not know/Unknown/Uncertain

ElementDescription: Leisure activities: walking, past 7 days
Notes: 0=Never; 1=Seldom (1-2 days); 2=Sometimes (3-4 days); 3=Often (5-7 days); Blank = Missing form/incomplete workbook/Not expected/Missing/Refused/Do not know/Unknown/Uncertain

ElementDescription: Leisure activities: light sport/recreation, past 7 days
Notes: 0=Never; 1=Seldom (1-2 days); 2=Sometimes (3-4 days); 3=Often (5-7 days); Blank = Missing form/incomplete workbook/Not expected/Missing/Refused/Do not know/Unknown/Uncertain

ElementDescription: Leisure activities: moderate sport/recreation, past 7 days
Notes: 0=Never; 1=Seldom (1-2 days); 2=Sometimes (3-4 days); 3=Often (5-7 days); Blank = Missing form/incomplete workbook/Not expected/Missing/Refused/Do not know/Unknown/Uncertain

ElementDescription: Leisure activities: strenuous sport/recreation, past 7 days
Notes: 0=Never; 1=Seldom (1-2 days); 2=Sometimes (3-4 days); 3=Often (5-7 days); Blank = Missing form/incomplete workbook/Not expected/Missing/Refused/Do not know/Unknown/Uncertain

ElementDescription: Leisure activities: muscle strength/endurance, past 7 days
Notes: 0=Never; 1=Seldom (1-2 days); 2=Sometimes (3-4 days); 3=Often (5-7 days); Blank = Missing form/incomplete workbook/Not expected/Missing/Refused/Do not know/Unknown/Uncertain

ElementDescription: Leisure activities: sitting, hours per day, past 7 days
Notes: 1=Less than 1 hour; 2=1 hour, but less than 2 hours; 3=2-4 hours; 4=More than 4 hours; Blank = Missing form/incomplete workbook/Not expected/Missing/Refused/Do not know/Unknown/Uncertain

ElementDescription: Leisure activities: walking, hours per day, past 7 days
Notes: 1=Less than 1 hour; 2=1 hour, but less than 2 hours; 3=2-4 hours; 4=More than 4 hours; Blank = Missing form/incomplete workbook/Not expected/Missing/Refused/Do not know/Unknown/Uncertain

ElementDescription: Leisure activities: light sport/recreation, hours per day, past 7 days
Notes: 1=Less than 1 hour; 2=1 hour, but less than 2 hours; 3=2-4 hours; 4=More than 4 hours; Blank = Missing form/incomplete workbook/Not expected/Missing/Refused/Do not know/Unknown/Uncertain

ElementDescription: Leisure activities: moderate sport/recreation, hours per day, past 7 days
Notes: 1=Less than 1 hour; 2=1 hour, but less than 2 hours; 3=2-4 hours; 4=More than 4 hours; Blank = Missing form/incomplete workbook/Not expected/Missing/Refused/Do not know/Unknown/Uncertain

ElementDescription: Leisure activities: strenuous sport/recreation, hours per day, past 7 days
Notes: 1=Less than 1 hour; 2=1 hour, but less than 2 hours; 3=2-4 hours; 4=More than 4 hours; Blank = Missing form/incomplete workbook/Not expected/Missing/Refused/Do not know/Unknown/Uncertain

ElementDescription: Leisure activities: muscle strength/endurance, hours per day, past 7 days
Notes: 1=Less than 1 hour; 2=1 hour, but less than 2 hours; 3=2-4 hours; 4=More than 4 hours; Blank = Missing form/incomplete workbook/Not expected/Missing/Refused/Do not know/Unknown/Uncertain

ElementDescription: Household activities: light housework, past 7 days
Notes: 0=No; 1=Yes; Blank = Missing form/incomplete workbook/Not expected/Missing/Refused/Do not know/Unknown/Uncertain

ElementDescription: Household activities: heavy housework, past 7 days
Notes: 0=No; 1=Yes; Blank = Missing form/incomplete workbook/Not expected/Missing/Refused/Do not know/Unknown/Uncertain

ElementDescription: Household activities: home repairs, past 7 days
Notes: 0=No; 1=Yes; Blank = Missing form/incomplete workbook/Not expected/Missing/Refused/Do not know/Unknown/Uncertain

ElementDescription: Household activities: lawn work/yard care, past 7 days
Notes: 0=No; 1=Yes; Blank = Missing form/incomplete workbook/Not expected/Missing/Refused/Do not know/Unknown/Uncertain

ElementDescription: Household activities: outdoor gardening, past 7 days

ElementDescription: Household activities: caring for another person, past 7 days
Notes: 0=No; 1=Yes; Blank = Missing form/incomplete workbook/Not expected/Missing/Refused/Do not know/Unknown/Uncertain

ElementDescription: Physical Activity Scale for the Elderly (PASE) score
Notes: Higher scores indicate greater activity levels
